ygData.subject: Re: INtresting stuff, Bard related is at the bottom.....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This refers to a Quest where you must recover a bullet from the head of a dead ogre.  Or something to that effect.  Yes, a bullet.  Don t recall the
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:18 PM 8/16/99 -0400, you wrote:
>
> Ok, here is some information I have collected recently that may be of intrest
> to some of you more quest/lore oriented bards out there. I hope we can get
> some discussion going on these topics.
>
> While I was hanging around in the Seafarer's Roost in East Freeport, the bard
> there did some performances..... here we go:
>
> Palana Willin says:
>
> "Within my head and inside my brain, I hold the power to set free Ogguk
> city. Open up it's doors to all that is pretty. Instead, here I am in a
> pile of my own dung smelling quite dingy. Drinking Ogre Swill with which i
> am stingy. I may have the key, but the point is quite moot. For you see, I
> am nothing more than a dumb, smelly Ogre brute. Thank you, I hope you
> enjoyed that one."
>



This refers to a Quest where you must recover a bullet from the head of a dead
ogre. Or something to that effect. Yes, a bullet. Don't recall the
specifics, just that apparently someone's gunpowder experiment went awry.

Talies the Wanderer
